line_1: With jealous Eyes the while their Steps observe,
line_2: Left playful Hours from steady Virtue swerve;

line_1: YOUR Lordship here then may observe,
To sanctify the space you now observe.
line_2: Mysterious nature's laws that never swerve,
Saving some double meaning in reserve;

line_1: But this you must with care observe,
line_2: That when you've wound up every nerve
